modName: Spooky Edits - Reworked Vanilla Female Shrouded Armor Texture Fix
summary: An attempt to get the female dark brotherhood clothes on par with the male version.. PSD included :)
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] I wish I knew the story behind the HD version of this texture set; the basics were in place but it seems the artist went to the pub and left his pet monkey to finish it :P. This is another monkey's attempt at bringing it up to the standard of the male set (so I can [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55725/]destroy it with one of my edits[/url], muwahaha)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] This is a texture replacer so you can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Double Size Versions :[/b][/color] This is NOT a HD retexture but I work in 16bit double res and the odd adjustment I do might benefit from higher res... maybe :P.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Lossless Versions :[/b][/color] These 24/32bit versions give a nicer depth to the textures and should be free from any artifacts, but are much more memory intensive so if you are already low on V-RAM then avoid :).

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I always use the lossless versions of my textures alongside an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url]

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Photoshop files :[/b][/color] I have decided it doesn't feel right uploading these to nexus given the file size, will shove them somewhere else if that is allowed ?

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Restrictions :[/b][/color] None.. use as you will :)


[center]
[color=Lightsteelblue][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56654/?]Darker Thieves Guild Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56587/?]Darker Mehrunes Razor[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56610/?]
Darker Jester Clothes[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55725/?]
Darker Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Armor and Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54816/?]Darker Vampire Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54998/?]Glass Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54641/?]Darker Falmer Heavy Armor and Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54463/]Darker Female Archmage Robes[/url][/center]
author: SpookyMunky

files.name: Spooky Edits - Female Dark Brotherhood Fix (2x-Lossless)
files.fileName: Spooky Edits - Female Dark Brotherhood Fix (2x-Lossless)-55809-.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Torso : Fixed some nasty artifacts I accidentally re-introduced with my quick vanilla colour fix in 0.1 (woops). Fixed some texture seams around the shoulder and side of chest.

Gloves : Replaced studs with male gauntlet studs then lowered their saturation to fit in more with the rest. Darkened the knuckles since they sucked :P. Darkened the black leather to match up with torso. 1st attempt at getting the black and red to join where they actually should. Fixed UV seams on the inner wrist.

Gloves Normal Map : Inverted the green chan so the studs point out, blurred a bit and overlayed some texture to the map. Created new spec map to hopefully match body a bit better.

Hood : Darkened a bit and added some noise :)

Boots : Removed some artifacts and de-saturated the studs to match everything else.

files.name: Spooky Edits - Female Dark Brotherhood Fix (2x)
files.fileName: Spooky Edits - Female Dark Brotherhood Fix (2x)-55809-0-2-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
I made a bit of a mess with 0.2, the vanilla res weren't vanilla, and the dxt5 compressed versions weren't using dxt5.. doh !. Everything should be right now (famous last words).

Added a couple of mixed resolution versions, with the vanilla 2k res for the armor and 1k for hood, gloves, glove normal, and boots.
